hero.headline: Custom Websites Built in Puerto Rico
hero.subheadline: Fully bilingual, beautifully designed, SEO ready.

about.title: About Nuvana
about.text: Nuvana creates stunning, custom websites for businesses of all sizes and industries. We empower your brand with expert web design and SEO solutions tailored to your unique vision. As a fully bilingual team, we're equipped to help you reach diverse markets and achieve your digital goals.

items.title: Custom Web Design
items.desc: Unique, modern websites tailored to your brand.

items.title: SEO Optimization
items.desc: Rank higher and get found by your customers.

items.title: Hosting & Maintenance
items.desc: Fast, secure hosting and ongoing support.

items.title: Responsive & Bilingual Sites
items.desc: Seamless experience in English and Spanish.

reasons.title: Website Expertise
reasons.desc: We understand what makes a website effective, creating designs that engage visitors and convert them into customers.

reasons.title: Bilingual Excellence
reasons.desc: Fully bilingual websites that seamlessly switch between English and Spanish for maximum reach.

reasons.title: Custom Solutions
reasons.desc: Every website is built from scratch to match your brand's unique identity and business goals.

reasons.title: Ongoing Support
reasons.desc: We don't just build and leave - we provide continuous support to ensure your website evolves with your business.

sites.name: Multi Electric Supply
